form.disableRepositoryConfigurationHelp: Do not allow repository owners to configure jenkins hooks. You have to restart your application server after changing this value.
form.disableGitTriggerHelp: Disable trigger for git repositories. Note: the git trigger requires version 1.1.14 or above of the jenkins git plugin.
form.disableMercurialTriggerHelp: Disable trigger for mercurial repositories. Note: the mercurial trigger requires version 1.38 or above of the jenkins mercurial plugin.

form.projectHelp: The name of the Jenkins project.
form.csrfHelp: Should be checked if your Jenkins instance is csrf protected.
form.usernameHelp: Username which is used for the authentication on the Jenkins ci server.
form.apiTokenHelp: The API Token of the user. This token is used for authentication. You could get your API Token from your Jenkins Server at http://yourjenkinsserver/jenkins/user/username/configure.
